name: Qwitcher Grypen
description: Inspired by the letterforms that come from using an architectural ruling pen, Qwitcher Grypen is a casual brush script with a bit of an edge. It comes in two styles, Regular and Bold, with Latin Character sets including Western, Central, and Vietnamese language support. To contribute, see github.com/googlefonts/qwitcher-grypen .
author: Robert Leuschke
